'''Taking Shape''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[The Art of Adventure]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to [[Forging|forge]] a 4-star weapon.

==Gameplay Notes==
* The only weapons that can be forged are 4-star weapons, so any weapon will fulfill this requirement.
